job_tasks.phrase: het end-to-end implementeren van ML modellen binnen het domein van digital advertising.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions implementing ML models end-to-end in a specific domain.

job_tasks.phrase: Modellen die voorspellen welke advertentie banner/creative het meest geschikt is voor een online bezoeker
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of predictive models for ad suitability.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor most likely converters/clickers van advertentie campagnes
job_tasks.justification: This refers to building predictive models for user conversion and clicks.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor het voorspellen van leeftijd en gender van DPG Media online bezoekers obv geconsumeerde content
job_tasks.justification: This details the creation of predictive models for user demographics based on content consumption.

job_tasks.phrase: Toevoegen van profile enrichments in batch & real-time flows in een big data environment
job_tasks.justification: This involves data processing and enrichment within data flows.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines & dashboards voor quality monitoring & alerting
job_tasks.justification: The role involves building data pipelines and dashboards for monitoring.

job_tasks.phrase: You build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, …)
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a strong focus on operationalizing and maintaining the developed solutions, including DevOps practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt samen met de Data & ML engineers ons ML Ops platform uit
job_tasks.justification: Directly states the development of an ML Ops platform.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt mee aan onze onderliggende data stack & data pipelines
job_tasks.justification: This involves contributing to the underlying data infrastructure, which includes software development aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: Je integreert onze services met andere DPG teams die van onze data services gebruik maken
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of services, a core software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Indien gewenst, bouw je mee aan onze web-applicaties (voor interne & externe gebruikers) die onze data-producten ontsluiten
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions building web applications to expose data products.

job_tasks.phrase: je analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: The task of analyzing requirements, justifying choices, and presenting results to business teams indicates business understanding and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters
coacht Machine Learning engineers en rolt best practises uit

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and implementing predictive ML models, including feature engineering and MLOps. While there are some software development tasks, the core focus remains on model development and operationalization within the digital advertising domain, aligning with the definition of an ML Engineer.
